title: Welcome, Shioriko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>You can use this area as you like for your belongings, Shioriko-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, if you forgot to bring something, I’ve got everything ready to lend you, so don’t worry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you, Ayumu-san. But I don’t think I will forget anything<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s right, you’re really reliable huh, Shioriko-chan…. Much much more than I am….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>A, Ah, Umm! Actually, I forgot to bring something today after all. Uhh…. my towels…. I forgot to bring my towels<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Leave it to me! I brought a lot! Umm…. here, take this. I have the same one with a different color!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wah, cute….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, it’s my favorite. Alright, let’s go to the practice, Shioriko-chan! Everyone is waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Okay! I’ll be in your care from now on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
